body.p: This is topicsetref test Map A. It includes topicset references to topic sets "topicset-map-B-topicset-01" and "topicset-map-B-topicset-02".
This topic includes scope-qualified key references to keys defined in Map B topicset-01 using both the topicsetref-defined key scope name and the key scope name on the topicset.
Reference to Map B topic 01 via scoped key:
